p: As additional variables, we also included distance to the coast (dist_coast) and two topographic variables, namely elevation and slope, both derived from the GTOPO30 model (courtesy of the U.S. Geological Survey), as these have been reported as relevant in determining the distribution of the disease [ 34, 52]. In particular, slope aimed at representing possible soil-related stressors on trees such as soil nutrient content or soil erosion. Table 1 provides for a summary of the variables tested.
